document.full_text: two teens in a group charged with bullying a newcomer to their school who committed suicide last year, pleaded guilty on wednesday to lesser charges in a deal expected to erase more serious allegations.
document.title: teens plead guilty to bullying girl who killed herself
lines_and_colors: two teens in a group charged with bullying a newcomer to their school who committed suicide last year, pleaded guilty on wednesday to lesser charges in a deal expected to erase more serious allegations.
